news.title: Trump threatens 50% tariffs on EU goods and 25% on iPhones not made in US
news.summary: Shares in the US and Europe fall after the US president says trade talks with the EU are "going nowhere".

news.title: Faisal Islam: Trump's tariff plans could spark global economic shock
news.summary: The move threatens significant volatility in the coming weeks, ahead of a crucial G7 summit in Canada next month.

news.title: Customers urged to fix energy bills as prices fall from July
news.summary: A typical annual domestic energy bill will drop by Â£129 in July, the first fall in a year.

news.title: Twelve injured in knife attack at  Hamburg station
news.summary: A suspect has been arrested and a major operation is under way, German police say.

news.title: Watch officer of ship that crashed into garden fell asleep, police say
news.summary: Police say the ship's watch officer admitted to being asleep during the incident in Norway.

news.title: Ukraine and Russia take part in biggest prisoner swap since 2022 invasion
news.summary: They each handed over 270 servicemen and 120 civilians on the Ukrainian border with Belarus.

news.title: Billy Joel cancels tour after brain condition diagnosis
news.summary: Doctors have told the veteran US singer to stop performing as he recovers from the rare condition.

news.title: Footage reveals Jay Slater's final hours in Tenerife
news.summary: The teenager, who was found dead in the Spanish island, made Snapchat videos the day he went missing.

news.title: Judge temporarily blocks Trump plan to stop Harvard enrolling foreign students
news.summary: It comes a day after the administration said it had revoked Harvard's access to student visa programmes.

news.title: British woman held in Sri Lanka on drug offences
news.summary: Charlotte May Lee, 21, from south London, denies knowing drugs were in her suitcase.
